title: i can't receive emails thru TB but yet I can send and receive on my Iphone
content:
Hi there......I have been attempting to get my TB to work on my thru my hosting web provider but have not been successful. I have used all of the incoming server and outgoing server suggestions and have not been able to receive emails with TB on my desktop. I can send and receive on my iphone but not thru TB. I have also tried manual config but no cigar. I was hoping to call TB support but I see that is not possible, only thru community support. If anyone can help me I would greatly appreciate it. I guess I will look to see if I get any responses thru my gmail acct which is pfbobbo.

Thanks so much in helping with this frustrating situation.

Bob

title: Sending a file from the W11 context menu
content: TB in WIN11. Right click on any file. In Win10, there was a "send to" option. In Win11, there's a "share" option. To send a file directly, select "show more options." The older version's menu will appear, and it will say "send to -> email recipient." Is there a way to generate an option to send files faster? When the file sending window appears from the file manager, the cursor in the message writing window doesn't move to the address field (as it does when composing a new message) but somewhere else. This is quite strange, because you automatically start typing the recipient's address, but it doesn't appear in the program. This is probably more a system issue than Mozilla's. Perhaps a registry entry or other action might work. Perhaps the submenu after right-clicking on a file, or the icon at the top next to "Copy, Paste, Cut" or in section share it.
creator: noraves99

title: Account di posta certificata cancellato da Aruba, email su Thunderbird cancellate
content: Buongiorno, ho configurato un accont email Pec su Thunderbird acquistato con Aruba. Aruba passati 90 giorni dalla scadenza, se non si effettua il rinnovo cancella la casella e non è possibile recuperare i messaggi. I messaggi ricevuti riuscivamo però a vederli su Thunderbird. Ieri ho riattivato la casella (comprando una nuova Pec con lo stesso nome) e da quel momento i messaggi su Thunderbird sono spariti (ho reinserito la password). C'è un modo per recuperarli? Grazie Cordiali saluti
creator: laurafalcinelli

title: How do I add a new account to Thunderbird using only email address and password? No name!
content:
I think there's not much to add past the title line, but I will emphasize that I want to add an account to the program, but have the field for my personal name be left blank from start to finish, and never have it populated. Not even adding an account and then removing the name later. Name never there at all.

It sure seems like Thunderbird is insisting on a name being given, and won't let me click continue with the field blank, like it ought to. I guess something is wrong in my default settings? What fixes it?
creator: PAGulley

title: Automatic deletion of emails from server
content:
I use the Plusnet webmail server and find that every so often have to manually empty the Plusnet inbox. I do not want to automatically deleting them from my computer. I have set up my Thunderbird account using pop3 and have tried all the combinations of settings in the heading...server settings..and checking and unchecking...... Leave messages on server For at most Until I delete them

and can not get the account to delete any emails from the server. Do I need to set something else under disk space? When you set For at most 14 days, is that 14 days from the email arriving at the computer, or 14 days from setting it to 14 days? Is there something that a am failing to do ? Any help gratefully received.
creator: jamieoyler

title: comportamiento del "doble click"
content:
Buenas tardes: Tengo el thunderbird completamente actualizado, pero desde hace unas semanas, en una de las cuentas de correo, cuando pulso el "intro" o el "Doble click", para abrir un mensaje en la bandeja de entrada, en vez de abrir el mensaje, me lo pone como para "responder". Sólo me pasa en una de las cuentas, en la otra, funciona todo ok.

Por favor, necesitaría una ayuda para resolver esta incomodidad. Sin embargo, si pulso la combinación de teclas "Ctrl+o" se abre correctamente, y si pulso el botón derecho del ratón y voy a la opción "Abrir", también lo hace correcto.

Quedo a la espera de sus amables noticias. Saludos cordiales. Carles F.
creator: franques2013

title: E-mails sumiram da caixa de entrada e da caixa de saída.
content: Olá bom dia. Como estão ? Gostaria de uma ajuda, pois todos os e-mails de minha conta sumiram, tanto a caixa de entrada, quanto a caixa de enviados. I tried add some mail.accountmanager.defaultaccount i prefs.js but with no luck. strace thunderbird show no tries to access any session. Also I changed checkbox in general setting at "use this page" but it didn't helped.

Can you help me or give at least info how to enable proper logging in this version?

title: Base64 inline images not displayed in Thunderbird (shown as empty space)
content:
When I compose a message in Thunderbird that contains an inline base64-encoded image (for example, an HTML ), the image is correctly visible in the compose window.

However, after sending the message:

Other mail clients and devices display the inline base64 image correctly.

In Thunderbird (both in Sent and Inbox folders), instead of the image there is just an empty placeholder/blank space.

Steps to reproduce:

Compose a new HTML message in Thunderbird.

Insert an inline base64 image (e.g., copy-paste from clipboard or manually via ).

Send the message.

Open the sent message in Thunderbird or receive it on the same Thunderbird client.

Actual result: The inline image is not displayed — only empty space is shown.

Expected result: Thunderbird should correctly render base64-encoded inline images, as other clients do.
creator: rom.btc.by
